titlestmt.titleproper: Rickert family genealogical research card file undated
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.unittitle: Rickert family genealogical research card file
did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of index cards providing information on the Rickert family and allied families, taken from various sources. The bulk of the collection is notes on various people with citations to records, including census, county records, marriage records, and church records. Most seem to be from Pennsylvania. There are also notes on tombstone inscriptions from Abington Friends Burial Grounds.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
